title: Rewind: Jennifer Lewis and Michael Blackson Interview
itunes:title: Rewind: Jennifer Lewis and Michael Blackson Interview
description:
Wednesday 7/4- Today on the show we revisited the time that the "Mother of Black Hollywood" Jennifer Lewis stopped by, where she spoke about her book, the obstacles she faced during her career and more. Also, remember when Kevin Hart and Michael Blackson were beefing? well we went back to when Michael Blackson stopped by and The Breakfast Club couldn't help but troll him with Kevin Hart questions. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Jonathan Todd Jackson who was charged with attempted extortion of Kevin Hart by sending a threatening letter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 7/4- Today on the show we revisited the time that the "Mother of Black Hollywood" Jennifer Lewis stopped by, where she spoke about her book, the obstacles she faced during her career and more. Also, remember when Kevin Hart and Michael Blackson were beefing? well we went back to when Michael Blackson stopped by and The Breakfast Club couldn't help but troll him with Kevin Hart questions. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Jonathan Todd Jackson who was charged with attempted extortion of Kevin Hart by sending a threatening letter.
